research_municipality_step.notes: The elected officials for Sonora city, TX, include the Mayor and four Council Members. Information was gathered from the City of Sonora website, the Texas Municipal League directory, the Texas State Directory Online, and a recent news article from February 2024. There were some minor discrepancies across sources regarding the full list of council members and their specific ward designations. The provided list prioritizes the most recent information and consistently listed officials. Darrell Barker and Mike Sanchez have ward designations, while Lionel Cervantes, Jr. and Betty Hernandez do not have consistently specified ward designations across the available sources.
